xxl.core.spatial.points
Class AbstractPoint

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.spatial.points.AbstractPoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Convertable, Point, DistanceTo<Point>
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoublePoint, FixedPoint, FloatPoint, NumberPoint
public abstract class AbstractPoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements Convertable, java.lang.Cloneable, Point

An "implementation" of the Point interface.

See Also:
Point, DoublePoint, FloatPoint, Serialized Form

read

public abstract void read(java.io.DataInput dataInput)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Reads the state (the attributes) for an object of this class from the specified data input and restores the calling object. The state of the object before calling read will be lost.
The read method must read the values in the same sequence and with the same types as were written by write.

Specified by:

Specified by:
read in interface Point
Parameters:

write

public abstract void write(java.io.DataOutput dataOutput)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Writes the state (the attributes) of the calling object to the specified data output. This method should serialize the state of this object without calling another write method in order to prevent recursions.

Specified by:
write in interface Convertable
Specified by:

Parameters:
